companyDescription: Welcome to Awakened Yoga in Sugar Land, Texas! Get stronger, more flexible, reduce pain and stress in a place that welcomes EVERYONE - regardless of your fitness level, age or size. We offer classes that are IN STUDIO or LIVE-STREAMED. Awakened Yoga Studio offers a series of postures and breathing exercises practiced to awaken, heal, and strengthen the body, mind, and soul. They welcome everyone, regardless of yoga experience. At Awakened Yoga Studio, we believe that investing in yourself is the key to transforming life from hectic to harmonious. A consistent practice is not just for your physical well-being but also for your overall mental and emotional health. We offer plenty of options for every budget and lifestyle.

productsAndServices.name: Kids Yoga
productsAndServices.description: Kids yoga classes are specialized classes focused on teaching kids this ancient practice. Just like adults, kids live in a world filled often over stimulated with information, social pressure, and activity overload. Teaching yoga to kids offers them a way to mindfully handle all that life offers to them in a healthy and relaxing way.
